plot outline: A mystery hacker steals from RBI which is the central bank of India. How he did it and why is the main plot of the movie. The movie shows an anonymous hacker recording a video and taunting the officials of the RAW agency of India. The movie moves between India, UK and Brazil and begins with the year 2062. The movie is a financial crime thriller.
title: Taskara
plot: A mysterious hacker steals 10 trillion rupees from the central bank of his country.

A mystery hacker steals from RBI which is the central bank of India. How he did it and why is the main plot of the movie. The movie shows an anonymous hacker recording a video and taunting the officials of the RAW agency of India. The movie moves between India, UK and Brazil and begins with the year 2062. The movie is a financial crime thriller.::Night Rider
